snippet: A gun control group filed a federal lawsuit on Wednesday against a law that challenges federal authority to regulate firearms.
abstract: Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence, gun control group, files federal lawsuit against 2013 Kansas state law that challenges federal authority to regulate firearms; challenge is intended to discourage other states from enacting similar measures.
lead_paragraph: A gun control group filed a federal lawsuit on Wednesday against a law that challenges federal authority to regulate firearms.

headline.main: Kansas: Group Files Suit Over 2013 Gun Law
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Group Files Suit Over 2013 Gun Law

keywords.value: Brady Campaign to Prevent Gun Violence
keywords.name: organizations
